data.title: Blaupunkt New York 830 Truck navigatore per mezzi pesanti e Truck
meta_keywords: navigatore per mezzi pesanti e Truck
Monitor auto 1 e 2 Din Car multimedia
data.meta_description: Monitor auto 1 e 2 Din > New York 830 Truck navigatore per mezzi pesanti e Truck Blaupunkt: Sistema multimediale 2 DIN con Navigazione GPS e mappa Europa co
data.text:
Sistema multimediale 2 DIN con Navigazione GPS e mappa Europa completa 43 paesi.

Software di navigazione iGO primo con TMC, visualizzazione 3D e punti di interesse Premium.

Garanzia Latest Map: mappa aggiornabile gratuitamente entro 30 giorni dalla prima attivazione.

Software GPS con specifiche truck: calcola il percorso ideale in base alle caratteristiche del mezzo ed il materiale trasportato.

Display touch screen digitale 6,2”.

Sintonizzatore radio FM/AM World Tuner (Europa, Americhe, Asia, Giappone).

RDS con funzioni PS, AF, EON, PTY, TP, TA, CT, RT.

Memorizza fino a 30 stazioni radio.

Lettore CD/DVD

compatibile con formati DVD, DVD+/-R/ RW,DVD-ROM, CD-DA,CD-ROM,CD-R/RW.

Riproduzione formati AVI,MP4,MPEG,MPG,Xvid, DivX,JPEG, JPG,WMA e MP3 con funzione ID3-Tag (visualizza file e cartelle).

Controllo diretto e ricarica iPod, iPhone tramite USB frontale e posteriore.

Modulo Bluetooth Parrott integrato con funzioni vivavoce, audio streaming e download rubrica telefonica.

Microfono Bluetooth integrato + microfono esterno con ingresso posteriore (incluso).

Ingresso retrocamera con attivazione automatica in caso di inserimento retromarcia.

Equalizzatore parametrico a 3 bande con 8 impostazioni predefinite (pop, rock, classic, jazz, techno, flat, optimal, user).

Potenza massima 4x50W

Ingressi frontali USB, SDHC, SD, MMC, AV-in jack 3,5mm,

ingressi posteriori USB e AV-in RCA.

Dual Zone:

2 uscite video per monitor posteriori con gestibili in modo indipendente.

Uscita pre-amplificata a 4 canali (2V)

Accessori contenuti nella confezione: telecomando, micro-SD 4GB con mappe precaricate, antenna GPS, sintonizzatore TMC,

microfono Bluetooth esterno, cornice, gabbia 2DIN e cablaggi.

Specifiche tecniche:

Display

6.2” digital TFT touch screen display

800 x 480 pixels

Wallpaper upload

Navigation

Pan-European car navigation

Pan-European truck navigation

Traffic Message Channel (TMC)

Data carrier

DVD: DVD, +/-R, +/-RW, -ROM

CD: CD-DA, -ROM, -R/-RW

VCD: VCD

USB: Front and rear USB for Audio and Video (Standard A-type)

Memory cards: Front SDHC slot for Audio and Video

Media player

Audio playback formats: MP3, WMA

Video playback formats: AVI, DivX®, MP4, MPEG, MPG, Xvid

Picture playback formats: JPEG, JPG

Bluetooth

Built-in Bluetooth

Hands-free calling (HFP)

Phone book upload (PBAP)

Ausio Streaming (A2DP)

2 microphones (built-in + external rear microphone)

Radio

Wave bands: FM, AM (MW/LW)

Radio Data System (RDS)

Rear seat entertainment

Audio / Video

Sources: DVD, VCD, CD, SDHC, SD, MMC, USB, AV-In

Inputs

USB: Front and rear

iPod: iPod/iPhone direct control via front and/or rear USB

Memory cards: SDHC, SD, MMC

Audio / Video: 1 front A/V, 1 rear A/V

Rear view camera

Outputs

Video/Audio-Out: 2 (CVBS) / 1

4 channel preamp-out

Subwoofer: Sub-out

Equalizer

Number of bands: 3

Model: parametric

Amplifier

Max. power: 4 x 50 Watt

Sinus power at 14,4V: 4 x 22 Watt

Navigation

Platform: iGo primo

Western Europe maps: 23 countries (TomTom)

Andorra, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Republic of Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Norway, Portugal, San Marino, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, Vatican

Eastern Europe maps: 20 countries (various map suppliers)

Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Former Yugoslavian Republic of Macedonia, Greece, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Montenegro, Poland, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Turkey, Ukraine

Navigation languages (voice and navigation system): 27 languages

Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (British), English (American), Estonian, Finnish,Flemish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian – None (Ding only)

Street names announced (Text to Speech): 11 languages

Danish, English (British), Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish

Dynamic navigation (TMC) : Yes

3D view mode: Yes

3D city map Western Europe: Yes

3D landmarks: Yes

3D buildings: Yes

Premium POI (Point Of Interest): Yes

Realistic junction view: Yes

Demo mode: Yes

Last map guarantee: Yes (30 days after 1st GPS reception)

Data carrier: Micro-SD, 4GB (included)

Map update: Yes, online via www.naviextras.com<//link>

Speed camera: Optional, online via www.naviextras.com<//link>

Truck Navigation

Western Europe truck data: 23 countries (TomTom)

Andorra, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Republic of Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Norway, Portugal, San Marino, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, Vatican

Eastern Europe truck data: 12 countries (various map suppliers)

Albania, Czech Republic, Estonia, Former Yugoslavian Republic of Macedonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Montenegro, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia

Truck attributes: Length, width, height, trailer, number of axles, max. allowed weight, actual weight, freight (explosives, flammable gas, non-flammable gas, poisonous gas), max. speed

Truck profiles: 3 profiles programmable

Truck timer settings: Number of drivers, max. continuous driving time, min./max. break time, max. daily driving time, warn in advance, current times display

Display

Technology: Digital

Type: TFT

Screen size: 6.2"

Resolution: 800 x 480 pixels

Touchscreen: Yes

Brightness adjustable: Yes (bright, normal, dark, night)

Display switch off: Yes (off after 10 or 20sec selectable)

Clock display: 24 / 12 hours

Wallpaper options: Black, blue, red, green, orange

Wallpaper / Picture upload: via Micro-SD

Radio system languages: English (British), German, Spanish, French, Italian, Polish (Navigation: 27 languages, see Navigation)

Radio

Type of tuner: Analogue receiver

World tuner (switchable): Yes (Europe, OIRT, Americas, Asia, Japan)

Wave bands: FM1, FM2, FM3, AM1 (MW), AM2 (LW)

Radio Data System (RDS): Alternative Frequencies (AF), Clock Time (CT), Enhanced Other Networks (EON), Programme Service Name (PS), Programme Types (PTY), Radio Text (RT), Traffic Announcement (TA), Traffic Programme (TP)

Travelstore: Yes (FM1, FM2, FM3)

Search via frequency: Yes

Station memory: 30

Sensitivity: lo/dx

Frequency response (Hz) -3dB: 30 – 15.000

Data carrier

VCD: VCD

CD: CD-DA, -ROM, -R/-RW

Frequency response (Hz) -3dB: 20 – 20.000

USB-removable storage: USB 2.0 compatible

Memory cards: SDHC (up to 32 GB), SD, MMC

Formatting USB, SDHC, SD, MMC: FAT, FAT 32

Micro-SD: Navigation / Picture upload

DVD player

Criteria browsing: Yes, for iPod/iPhone

Repeat: Yes (all, folder, track)

Fast forward / fast rewind: Yes (x2, x4, x8, x20)

CD text: Yes

Bit rate MP3: 32 – 320 kBit/s

Bit rate WMA: 32 – 192 kBit/s

Variable bit rates: Yes

Balance: Yes (+/- 24 steps)
